name: Textkernel
overview:
Textkernel translates text mining and information extraction into effective business solutions.

Textkernel is developing technology for advanced information extraction and text understanding, in order to provide computers with full power over large volumes of unstructured textual information. Textkernel’s free format text recognition technology is packaged into Textractor Enterprise, an adaptive multi-lingual Information Extraction engine. Textractor is easily trained on domain specific labeled examples to capture key semantic information from your documents, regardless of their language, format, layout or vocabulary. The result is an intelligent and high accuracy conversion of unstructured text into easy-to-integrate structured output. Textkernel delivers fully engineered end-to-end solutions that solve complex data entry automation tasks in a variety of application contexts.
